ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlem3-2.1 | |- ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = g -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` g ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = g -> ( ( F ` x ) e. _V <-> ( F ` g ) e. _V ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( x = g -> ( ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) <-> ( Fun F /\ ( F ` g ) e. _V ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_chvarv | |- ( Fun F /\ ( F ` g ) e. _V ) |
